parameters: You were really brave down there, even though you're
afraid of the dark and all.
I had someone big to help hold my hand to get through
Haha! Yeah, I guess you did!
I think he misses you, too.
Now come on! It's time for a story!
It's okay, the power just went out.
We can use the flashlight to \C[2]find our way out\C[0].
O-ok, but you gotta hold my hand.
It's ok, you don't have to be scared, I'm right here.

There's a lot of memories in this basement. A lot of
You can't keep them boxed up forever.

Argh... I don't think... I can...

Please... I don't want to be alone.
I miss you... I miss you so much, Alex.
